result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
result.translation: 51. Haddaan doonnona, waxaan u soo diri laheyn magaalo walba dige25.
result.footnotes: 25. Wuxuuse Alle doonay inuu soo diro Nabi Muxammad s.c.w. inuu ahaado Rasuulka lagu khatimo Rususha Alle oo dhan, isagoo loo diray dhammaan dadka arlada jooga ilaa Qiyaamaha.
